articles.title: Dead Boy Detectives reviews are in – and yes, it's gay - PinkNews
articles.description: Based on the comic book by The Sandman creator Neil Gaiman, Dead Boy Detectives has arrived on Netflix - and the reviews are in.
articles.content:
Based on the comic book of the same name by The Sandman creator Neil Gaiman, Dead Boy Detectives arrived on Netflix today (25 April) – and the reviews are in.
Starring Jayden Revri and George Rexstr… [+2637 chars]

articles.title: ‘Heartstopper’ Adds Jonathan Bailey, Hayley Atwell and Eddie Marsan to Season 3 Cast - Variety
articles.description: Jonathan Bailey, Hayley Atwell and Eddie Marsan have joined the cast of 'Heartstopper' Season 3.
articles.content:
Jonathan Bailey, Hayley Atwell and Eddie Marsan have joined the cast of “Heartstopper” Season 3.
